name: Warrior
description: A powerful melee combatant specialized in swords, axes, and heavy armor.

name: Mage
description: A glass cannon who wields arcane magic and elemental spells from a distance.

name: Rogue
description: A master of shadows and stealth, dealing high critical damage and dodging attacks.

name: Ranger
description: A survivalist and archer who uses bows and nature-based skills to track foes.

name: Paladin
description: A holy knight combining heavy physical defense with divine healing magic.

name: Cleric
description: A dedicated healer and supporter who uses holy light to mend wounds and buff allies.
